thread.title: Woman Arrested for Giving Her Boyfriend a BJ in Courthouse
thread.title_full: Woman Arrested for Giving Her Boyfriend a BJ in Courthouse

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Woman Arrested for Giving Her Boyfriend a BJ in Courthouse
text:
A 26-year-old woman posted a video on social media of herself giving her boyfriend a BJ inside Florida courthouse has been arrested. FYI, for those wondering, this is not an official Cosmo sex tip, and we do not advise it. Now, onto the show!
The New York Post reports that Brittney Jones was in court facing charges of drug paraphernalia and violating her probation when her horniness got the best of her, and she decided to give her boyfriend a blow job. She also decided to film it, and then post it on social media.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below In the video, she scans the empty corridor outside the courtroom before she goes down on a man sitting on a bench.
"Had so much fun at court today. Found a way to get my charges dropped.... h don't tell," she captioned the 34-second video on Twitter.
Although Jones has already deleted the scandalous post, she has been charged with performing an unnatural and lascivious act. (That's wording is a lil' bit dramatic; don't ya think?)
Unfortunately, her BJ technique wasn't enough to keep her boyfriend around â€” Jones recently posted that they broke up.
Follow Laura on Twitter .
